name: Gopichand Badminton Academy
briefInfo: A premier badminton training facility founded by Pullela Gopichand to produce world-class players.

name: National Institute of Sports (NIS)
briefInfo: The largest sports institute in Asia, providing training across various Olympic sports.

name: Army Sports Institute
briefInfo: Established to identify and nurture sporting talent within the Indian Army for global competitions.

name: Prakash Padukone Badminton Academy
briefInfo: A top badminton academy founded by the former All-England Champion, Prakash Padukone.

name: Tata Archery Academy
briefInfo: Trains young archers to compete at national and international levels with state-of-the-art facilities.

name: Lakshya Shooting Club
briefInfo: One of the leading shooting academies in India, producing international-level marksmen.
